column1: Funeral services will be held on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 AM in the Cape Fear Conference ""B"" Headquarters
column5: NC.  Burial will follow in Rockfish Memorial Park. There will be a viewing on Tuesday from 2:00 PM to 7:00 PM; the family will receive friends from 6:00 PM to 7:00 PM at the funeral home.
